com.persistit

Class Management.VolumeInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.persistit.Management.AcquisitionTimeBase
      • com.persistit.Management.VolumeInfo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<Management.VolumeInfo>
    Enclosing interface:
    Management

    public static class Management.VolumeInfo
extends Management.AcquisitionTimeBase
implements Serializable, Comparable<Management.VolumeInfo>
    Exposes information about a Volume. The Management.getVolumeInfoArray() returns information about all open Volumes in an array of VolumeInfo elements.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Return the page size for this Volume.
        Returns:
        the size of each page in this Volume

        public String getName()
        Return the alias if one was assigned in the system configuration.
        Returns:
        the alias for this volume, or null if there is none

        Return the time and date when the most recent file extension occurred.
        Returns:

      • getGeneration

        public long getGeneration()
        Return the generation number for this Volume. The generation number increases as the state of the volume changes.
        Returns:
        The current generation

      • getGetCounter

        public long getGetCounter()
        Return the number of get operations on this Volume. A get operation occurs when a thread attempts to find or update information on the page, regardless of whether the page had previously been copied into the BufferPool.
        Returns:
        the get counter

      • getReadCounter

        public long getReadCounter()
        Return the number of physical read operations performed against pages in this Volume. The read occurs only when Persistit requires the content of a page that has not already been copied into the BufferPool or which has become invalid.
        Returns:
        the read counter

      • getWriteCounter

        public long getWriteCounter()
        Return the number of physical write operations performed against pages in this Volume.
        Returns:
        the write counter

      • getFetchCounter

        public long getFetchCounter()
        Return the count of Exchange.fetch() operations. These include Exchange.fetchAndStore() and Exchange.fetchAndRemove() operations. This count is maintained within the stored Volume and is not reset when Persistit closes. It is provided to assist in application performance tuning.
        Returns:
        The count of records fetched from this Volume.

      • getTraverseCounter

        public long getTraverseCounter()
        Return the count of Exchange.traverse(com.persistit.Key.Direction, boolean) operations. These include Exchange.next(), Exchange.previous() and other derivative operations. This count is maintained within the stored Volume and is not reset when Persistit closes. It is provided to assist in application performance tuning.
        Returns:
        The count of key traversal operations performed on this in this Volume.

      • getStoreCounter

        public long getStoreCounter()
        Return the count of Exchange.store(com.persistit.Key, com.persistit.Value) operations, including Exchange.fetchAndStore() operations. This count is maintained within the stored Volume and is not reset when Persistit closes. It is provided to assist in application performance tuning.
        Returns:
        The count of records fetched from this Volume.

      • getRemoveCounter

        public long getRemoveCounter()
        Return the count of Exchange.remove() operations, including Exchange.fetchAndRemove() operations. This count is maintained within the stored Volume and is not reset when Persistit closes. It is provided to assist in application performance tuning.
        Returns:
        The count of records fetched from this Volume.

      • getCurrentSize

        public long getCurrentSize()
        Return the current size in bytes of this Volume.
        Returns:
        current size

      • getMaximumPageAddress

        public long getMaximumPageAddress()
        Return the largest page address currently in use within the Volume.
        Returns:
        the largest page address

      • getMaximumSize

        public long getMaximumSize()
        Return the maximum size in bytes to which this Volume may grow.
        Returns:
        the maximum size

      • getExtensionSize

        public long getExtensionSize()
        Return the size in bytes by which Persistit will extend this Volume when additional file space is required.
        Returns:
        The extension size
